data.text: @Portal_Queen Had mine on Friday with a cold pharmacist warned me I might have it rough for a few days. Two days after the vaccine I spent the day in bed. However it isn’t (anecdotally) unusual to be knocked for 6. I had AZ.

@Portal_Queen @Nathanjones0001 I’m not medic but I guess you might as well kill two birds with one stone. Get all of the illnesses/symptoms out of the way so you can have some fun when it’s finally safe to go out with your family/friends. 😃

@Portal_Queen Vaccine knocked me on my backside for 4 days. The reality being an assurance that my old body was doing the necessary & probably reacting entirely the way it should do. Who knew!

Either way, cold or no cold, dose up on paracetamol before you go & for probably 3 days after.
@Portal_Queen Sore arm. Sweats. Headache. Plenty of water and paracetamol handy. You’ll be fine.
@Portal_Queen Sebastian Rushworth M.D. did highlight the good health of the majority of participants being “25 BMI” and younger people. Anyhow I have removed the link as requested. 😀
@Goosedancer Except the effect on taking the vaccine with a cold.
@Portal_Queen All gone. Sorry you didn’t find it helpful.

@Portal_Queen Based on the lack of evidence. The third vaccine Sebastian Rushworth M.D.      clearly states he would take. 
It’s one of the most detailed and factual articles on the subject. Certainly covers everything in detail 👍
@Goosedancer The 'would I have it' and 'would i give it to my children' bits are worth re-reading.
@Portal_Queen It’s not anti vaccine. You can’t have read it. I was being helpful.
@Goosedancer Please remove this anti-vax article from my timeline.
@Nathanjones0001 It says I can still have the vaccine, but I just wondered if the side effects might be different.
@Portal_Queen I've heard you are supposed to wait until 28 days after having covid but I am not sure about. colds / flu.
